mapper.insert: insert into pg_class (relname, relnamespace, reltype, reloftype, relowner, relam, relfilenode, reltablespace, relpages, reltuples, relallvisible, reltoastrelid, relhasindex, relisshared, relpersistence, relkind, relnatts, relchecks, relhasoids, relhaspkey, relhasrules, relhastriggers, relhassubclass, relrowsecurity, relforcerowsecurity, relispopulated, relreplident, relispartition, relfrozenxid, relminmxid, relacl, reloptions, relpartbound ) values (#{relname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relnamespace,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reltype,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reloftype,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relowner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relam,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relfilenode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reltablespace,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relpages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reltuples,jdbcType=REAL}, #{relallvisible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reltoastrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relhasindex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relisshared,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relpersistence,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{relkind,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{relnatts,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{relchecks,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{relhasoids,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relhaspkey,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relhasrules,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relhastriggers,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relhassubclass,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relrowsecurity,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relforcerowsecurity,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relispopulated,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relreplident,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{relispartition,jdbcType=BIT}, #{relfrozenxid,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{relminmxid,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{relacl,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{reloptions,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{relpartbound,jdbcType=OTHER} )
mapper.select: select relname, relnamespace, reltype, reloftype, relowner, relam, relfilenode, reltablespace, relpages, reltuples, relallvisible, reltoastrelid, relhasindex, relisshared, relpersistence, relkind, relnatts, relchecks, relhasoids, relhaspkey, relhasrules, relhastriggers, relhassubclass, relrowsecurity, relforcerowsecurity, relispopulated, relreplident, relispartition, relfrozenxid, relminmxid, relacl, reloptions, relpartbound from pg_class
